cast.overview: Several friends travel to Sweden to study as anthropologists a summer festival that is held every ninety years in the remote hometown of one of them. What begins as a dream vacation in a place where the sun never sets, gradually turns into a dark nightmare as the mysterious inhabitants invite them to participate in their disturbing festive activities.
cast.title: Midsommar

cast.original_title: The Last Letter from Your Lover
cast.overview: A young journalist in London becomes obsessed with a series of letters she discovers that recounts an intense star-crossed love affair from the 1960s.
cast.title: The Last Letter from Your Lover

details.biography: Vilhelm Blomgren (born July 17, 1991) is a Swedish actor, singer and musician. He studied acting and music at the College of Theater and Music at the University of Gothenburg, which is located close to the Sweden-Norway border. He is best known for his performance as Pelle in Ari Aster's feature film, Midsommar (2019) in which he played his first role in an English-speaking film.
details.name: Vilhelm Blomgren
